column14: Leave the header name and column position unchanged (i.e. Item, Start, Finish, Color, Item Name, Item Position, Days)
Modify data from left to right from column A to G and downwards from row 2, don't worry the Python code will pick up the last row entry
Set item position to 1 to stack items in a vertical sequence (similar to MS Project) and to position 0 to stack items in a horizontal sequence (practical for drilling sequences)
